name: PKPaymentRequestMerchantSessionUpdate
desc: An object that updates a payment request with a merchant validation.

items.name: init(status: PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus, merchantSession: PKPaymentMerchantSession?)
items.desc: Creates a payment method update with the specified status and merchant session.

items.name: var status: PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: The current authorization status for the payment.

items.name: var session: PKPaymentMerchantSession?
items.desc: An object that validates the identity of a merchant for the payment request.

items.name: class PKPaymentMerchantSession
items.desc: An object that validates the identity of a merchant for a payment request.
